text:
Marika Bianchini (born 23 April 1993 in Bagno a Ripoli) is an Italian volleyball player. She played at the 2011 FIVB Volleyball Women's U20 World Championship, winning a gold medal, and the 2015–16 CEV Women's Champions League.
She played for Unendo Yamamay Busto Arsizio, Liu Jo Nordmeccanica Modena, and Saugella Monza.

annotations.surface_form: 2011 FIVB Volleyball Women's U20 World Championship
